languages.text: {n}Ваша сущность избавляется от всего лишнего, бренного, малозначительного. Обостренный в миллионы раз разум с жадностью осознает грандиозные свершения, что ждут впереди. Стоит вам помыслить это, как дрожь прокатывается по ткани бытия. Божество вернулось. Божество идет — и Пророк его идет подле него.{/n}

{n}Your form is rid of everything excessive, transitory, or trivial. Your mind, now a million times sharper, is hungrily processing the great deeds that lie ahead of you. The moment these thoughts crystallise, a shiver reverberates throughout the fabric of existence. The Deity has returned. The Deity comes — and Its Messenger walks at Its side.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ваша сущность избавляется от всего лишнего, бренного, малозначительного. Обостренный в миллионы раз разум с жадностью осознает грандиозные свершения, что ждут впереди. Стоит вам помыслить это, как дрожь прокатывается по ткани бытия. Божество вернулось. Божество идет — и Пророк его идет подле него.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}In the heat of the biotransference, your entity gets rid of everything excessive, transitory, trivial. You attain a domineering form. Your mind, now a million times more sharp, eagerly comprehends the grandiose accomplishments that lie ahead of you. As soon as these thoughts enter your head, a shiver is sent through the fabric of being. The deity has returned. The deity is coming — and His Messiah is coming alongside Him.{/n}

{n}In the heat of the biotransference, your entity gets rid of everything excessive, transitory, trivial. You attain a domineering form. Your mind, now a million times more sharp, eagerly comprehends the grandiose accomplishments that lie ahead of you. As soon as these thoughts enter your head, a shiver is sent through the fabric of being. The deity has returned. The deity is coming — and His Messiah is coming alongside Him.{/n}

{n}Your entity gets rid of everything excessive, transitory, or trivial. Your mind, now a million times sharper, is eagerly making sense of the grandiose accomplishments that lie ahead of you. As soon as these thoughts enter your mind, a shiver reverberates through the fabric of being. The deity has returned. The deity is coming—and His Messiah is coming along.{/n}

{n}Your entity gets rid of everything excessive, transitory, or trivial. Your mind, now a million times sharper, is eagerly making sense of the grandiose accomplishments that lie ahead of you. As soon as these thoughts enter your mind, a shiver reverberates through the fabric of being. The deity has returned. The deity is coming—and His Messiah is coming along.{/n}

{n}Your form is rid of everything excessive, transitory, or trivial. Your mind, now a million times sharper, is hungrily processing the great deeds that lie ahead of you. The moment these thoughts crystallise, a shiver reverberates throughout the fabric of existence. The Deity has returned. The Deity comes — and Its Messenger walks at Its side.{/n}

{n}Your form is rid of everything excessive, transitory, or trivial. Your mind, now a million times sharper, is hungrily processing the great deeds that lie ahead of you. The moment these thoughts crystallise, a shiver reverberates throughout the fabric of existence. The Deity has returned. The Deity comes — and Its Messenger walks at Its side.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Votre entité se débarrasse de tout ce qui est excessif, transitoire ou trivial. Désormais un million de fois plus affûté, votre esprit embrasse avidement les accomplissements grandioses qui vous attendent. Dès que ces pensées prennent forme, un frisson se répercute dans la trame de l'existence. La Divinité est de retour. Elle arrive, accompagnée de {mf|Son messager|Sa messagère}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your form is rid of everything excessive, transitory, or trivial. Your mind, now a million times sharper, is hungrily processing the great deeds that lie ahead of you. The moment these thoughts crystallise, a shiver reverberates throughout the fabric of existence. The Deity has returned. The Deity comes — and Its Messenger walks at Its side.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre entité se débarrasse de tout ce qui est excessif, transitoire ou trivial. Désormais un million de fois plus affûté, votre esprit embrasse avidement les accomplissements grandioses qui vous attendent. Dès que ces pensées prennent forme, un frisson se répercute dans la trame de l'existence. La Divinité est de retour. Elle arrive, accompagnée de {mf|Son messager|Sa messagère}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tu forma se libra de todo lo excesivo, transitorio y trivial. Tu mente, ahora un millón de veces más aguda, está procesando con avidez los grandiosos logros que te esperan. En cuanto esos pensamientos se materializan, un escalofrío reverbera en el tejido de la existencia. La Deidad ha vuelto. La Deidad está llegando, y Su Mensajero está a Su lado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your form is rid of everything excessive, transitory, or trivial. Your mind, now a million times sharper, is hungrily processing the great deeds that lie ahead of you. The moment these thoughts crystallise, a shiver reverberates throughout the fabric of existence. The Deity has returned. The Deity comes — and Its Messenger walks at Its side.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu entidad se libra de todo lo excesivo, transitorio y trivial. Tu mente, ahora un millón de veces más aguda, está comprendiendo con avidez los grandiosos logros que te esperan. En cuanto esos pensamientos aparecen en tu mente, un escalofrío reverbera en el tejido de la existencia. La deidad ha vuelto. La deidad está en camino, y Su Mesías está a su lado.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你的实体摆脱了所有琐碎的多余之物，摆脱了转瞬即逝的一切。如今，你的头脑比之前敏锐了一百万倍，正如饥似渴地渴望着伟大的旅途。当这些想法在你的脑海中成型的那一刻起，你的身体便不住地颤抖着。神明归来了，神明降世了——祂的令使也随祂而来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your form is rid of everything excessive, transitory, or trivial. Your mind, now a million times sharper, is hungrily processing the great deeds that lie ahead of you. The moment these thoughts crystallise, a shiver reverberates throughout the fabric of existence. The Deity has returned. The Deity comes — and Its Messenger walks at Its side.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的实体摆脱了所有琐碎的多余之物，摆脱了转瞬即逝的一切。如今，你的头脑比之前敏锐了一百万倍，正急切地理解着你面前的一切。当这些想法灌入你的脑海时，你的身体不住地颤抖起来。神明回来了，神明降世了——而祂的弥赛亚也随祂一起来了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Deine Gestalt ist von allen überschüssigen, flüchtigen oder trivialen Dinge befreit. Dein nun um ein Vielfaches schärferer Verstand denkt bereits gierig an die großen Taten, die vor dir liegen. Als diese Gedanken kristallisieren, lässt ein Schauder das Gewebe der Existenz erzittern. Die Gottheit ist zurückgekehrt. Die Gottheit kommt ... und {mf|Ihr Sendbote|Ihre Sendbotin} geht an ihrer Seite.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your form is rid of everything excessive, transitory, or trivial. Your mind, now a million times sharper, is hungrily processing the great deeds that lie ahead of you. The moment these thoughts crystallise, a shiver reverberates throughout the fabric of existence. The Deity has returned. The Deity comes — and Its Messenger walks at Its side.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dein ganzes Wesen entledigt sich aller überschüssigen, flüchtigen oder trivialen Dinge. Dein Verstand, der nun eine Million Mal schärfer ist, versucht eifrig, die glorreichen Erfolge zu begreifen, die vor dir liegen. Sobald diese Gedanken in deinen Verstand kommen, hallt in den grundlegenden Fasern des Seins ein Schaudern wider. Die Gottheit ist zurückgekehrt. Die Gottheit kommt — und ihr Messias kommt mit.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたの実体から、過剰なもの、儚きもの、つまらないものがすべて取り除かれた。百万倍鋭くなったあなたの精神は、目の前にある壮大なる偉業を貪欲なまでに理解していく。その思考が結晶化した瞬間、存在の生地に震えがこだまする。神が戻ってきたのだ。神が来られる…そして、その御使いも共にやってくるのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your form is rid of everything excessive, transitory, or trivial. Your mind, now a million times sharper, is hungrily processing the great deeds that lie ahead of you. The moment these thoughts crystallise, a shiver reverberates throughout the fabric of existence. The Deity has returned. The Deity comes — and Its Messenger walks at Its side.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの実体から、過剰なもの、儚きもの、つまらないものがすべて取り除かれた。百万倍鋭くなったあなたの精神は、目の前にある壮大なる偉業を貪欲なまでに理解していく。その思考が結晶化した瞬間、存在の生地に震えがこだまする。神が戻ってきたのだ。神が来られる…そして、その御使いも共にやってくるのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Biçimin aşırı, geçici veya önemsiz hiçbir şeyi barındırmıyor. Artık milyonlarca kat daha keskin olan zihnin, seni bekleyen görevleri açlıkla işliyor. Bu düşünceler kristalleştiğinde varoluşun kumaşında bir titreşim yaratıyor. Tanrı geri döndü. Tanrı döndü ve Ulağı yanında yürüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your form is rid of everything excessive, transitory, or trivial. Your mind, now a million times sharper, is hungrily processing the great deeds that lie ahead of you. The moment these thoughts crystallise, a shiver reverberates throughout the fabric of existence. The Deity has returned. The Deity comes — and Its Messenger walks at Its side.{/n}
